trans-unit.source: Contains filter criteria for data extracted from a workflow instance in a <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions"></xref>.
> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] A TrackingDataItemValue specifies the value of a piece of data extracted from a workflow.

It is used to constrain the set of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> objects returned by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> in a query of the tracking data base used by a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>.

You can add TrackingDataItemValue objects to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to specify that the set of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> objects returned by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> be constrained to those possessing the specified set of extracted data.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue"></xref> class.

The default constructor initializes <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue.DataValue%2A>, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue.FieldName%2A>, and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue.QualifiedName%2A> to a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
You must set all of these properties in order to configure the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue>.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue"></xref> class by using the specified qualified name of an activity, data field name, and <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> representation of a data value.

The <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue.QualifiedName%2A>, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue.FieldName%2A>, and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue.DataValue%2A> properties are set according to the values specified by the equivalent parameters to the constructor.
The qualified name of the activity from which the data was extracted.
The name of the member from which the data was extracted.
A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> representation of the value of the data.
Gets or sets a <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> representation of the value of the extracted data.
DataValue can be a null reference (`Nothing`).
A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> representation of the value of the extracted data.
The default is a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic).
Gets or sets the name of the activity member from which the data was extracted.
FieldName corresponds to the name specified in a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItem.FieldName%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

FieldName can, therefore, be set to specify an activity field or property; a member of an activity field or property; or a single element of an activity field or property (or a member of either) that implements the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface.

For more information see <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItem.FieldName%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingExtract.Member%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityDataTrackingExtract.Member%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowDataTrackingExtract.Member%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
The name of the activity member from which the data was extracted.
The default is a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic).
Gets or sets the qualified name of the activity from which the data was extracted.
QualifiedName is equivalent to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.QualifiedName%2A> property of the activity from which the data was extracted.
The qualified name of the activity from which the data was extracted.
The default is a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic).
